sentences.english: He must be permitted to speak of that Paris as though it still existed.
sentences.chinese: 请允许他谈那旧时的巴黎，好象它现在仍然存在一样。

sentences.english: I'm only paying back on old debt of thankfulness.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我只是在偿还这份旧时的人情债。

sentences.english: It is impossible for him to drag the modern society back to the horse-and-buggy era.
sentences.chinese: 他要想把现代社会拉向旧时代，那是不可能的。

sentences.english: Working is like old-time marriage, obviously you got no happiness, but still you have to live with it.
sentences.chinese: 上班就像旧时代的婚姻，明明不幸福，还得长相厮守。

sentences.english: And where the road bends a small bridge is suddenly seen.
sentences.chinese: 旧时茅店社林边，路转溪桥忽见。

sentences.english: From the ashes of the old times a new world will arise.
sentences.chinese: 新世界将从旧时代的灰烬中华丽诞生。

sentences.english: The old days of corporate beneficence and loyalty to longtime employees are long gone.
sentences.chinese: 旧时企业对老员工的关怀和忠诚早就烟飞云灭了。

sentences.english: Pinchgut is now a museum for cannon and antique mat è riel.
sentences.chinese: 品奇各特现在是大炮和旧时军用装备博物馆。

sentences.english: In a reenactment scene, Khmer men working with stone grinding construction.
sentences.chinese: 旧时重现的现场，高棉人用石头打磨建筑。

sentences.english: In a reenactment scene, workers digging inside a canal.
sentences.chinese: 旧时重现的现场，人们在挖掘隧道。

sentences.english: And with the hot bats came some good old-fashioned excitement in the Bronx.
sentences.chinese: 还有，一些像是来自旧时代布隆克斯区的火热支援。

sentences.english: The parlance pressed aforetime, ten inside art gallery arrive this comes to an end for the time being.
sentences.chinese: 按旧时的说法，十里画廊到此告一段落。

sentences.english: They believed the nation was a "new order for the ages."
sentences.chinese: 因为奠基者们认为，这个国家是“旧时代的新秩序”。

sentences.english: Most of the landlords in old China own a big mansion.
sentences.chinese: 大部分旧时中国的地主都有大的庭院。

sentences.english: They look at it as a natural passing from old age to senility .
sentences.chinese: 他们看看它作为一个自然通过从旧时代到衰老。

sentences.english: Song of the things old neighborhood, and wild wild rattan vine tree low pressure.
sentences.chinese: 旧时邻曲各东西，野蔓荒藤压树低。

definition: Lao Cai, Vietnam/Laokai or Laukkai, Burma (Myanmar)
last year/the Chinese New Year (i.e. the new year in the old calendar)
marketplace/town/the street (urban milieu)/the haunts of the common people
